title: The Trinity Pact
description: When evil threatens, and all seems lost, there is still a glimmer of hope.Trinity never fit in with the other kids in Salem. She was too smart, too distant, and strange things happened wherever she went. Then she met Colin, a brilliant student and loyal friend. It seemed she might be able to live a normal life after all. There was just one little snag—the appearance of a mysterious man who seemed determined to kill her.Now, in order to save her only friend, Trinity must follow the elusive assassin through time and space, into a world she never knew existed…
author: E.M. Shelton
